sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import "./Navbar.css"; import logo from "../images/sf-logo-1 1.png"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; export default function Navbar() { const [selectedElement, setSelectedElement] = useState(null); useEffect(() => { const element = document.getElementById("click"); if (element) { element.addEventListener("click", handleClick); } return () => { if (element) { element.removeEventListener("click", handleClick); } }; }, []); const handleClick = (event) => { const clickedElement = event.target; if (clickedElement && clickedElement.style) { if (selectedElement) { selectedElement.style.fontWeight = "normal"; } clickedElement.style.fontWeight = "bold"; setSelectedElement(clickedElement); } }; return ( <>
